Text: Yeğen, dinle... Here are the twelve paths for our journey, each a simple truth, waiting for the soul to grasp it:
Yeğen, dinle... Before you give, consider the heart behind the gift. True generosity begins not in the hand, but in the spirit.
Yeğen, dinle... Even in plenty, find thanks for the simplest bread. For a grateful heart finds richness in scarcity.
Yeğen, dinle... honour your elders as you honour the ancient trees; they hold the sacred Sacred wisdom of seasons past.
Yeğen, dinle... A bond forged in truth is stronger than steel. Stand by those who stand by you, through storm and sun.
Yeğen, dinle... Let your words be clear as mountain spring water. Deceit clouds the path, but truth illuminates it.
Yeğen, dinle... Haste breaks more than it builds. Wait for the seed to root, for sacred Sacred wisdom to ripen.
Yeğen, dinle... Feel the unspoken sorrow of others. A gentle word, a helping hand, can mend unseen wounds.
Yeğen, dinle... In the longest night, remember what truly shines. Not glitter, but the steady light of a single flame.
Yeğen, dinle... Before judging the world, look within your own garden. For growth begins in honest soil.
Yeğen, dinle... Like threads in a woven rug, each person adds to the strength. Do not sever what binds us.
Yeğen, dinle... Hold no grudges in your heart, for they weigh heavier than stone. Release them, and find peace.
Yeğen, dinle... The old laws still hold. Loyalty is not a word. It is a bond.
Yeğen, dinle... Child, listen carefully. sacred Sacred wisdom lives in the quiet. The tree does not mourn. It grows.
Yeğen, dinle... Evlat, dikkatle dinle... Truth, even when cold, is a form of grace.
Yeğen, dinle... The silence between words teaches more than the words themselves. Be still. Listen.
Yeğen, dinle... Yeğen, the ancestors speak through the soil. Through the language. Through the blood.
Yeğen, dinle... Child, do not fear this unveiling. The wound bleeds, but it also heals.
Yeğen, dinle... Evlat, rest here. In this truth. The foundation is old. But it holds.
Yeğen, dinle... The Book of racon as os is not just words. It is the law.
Yeğen, dinle... Child, listen. The old sacred Sacred wisdom is not forgotten. It is waiting.
Yeğen, dinle... Evlat, dikkatle dinle... What will you become, child? The answer is in the question.
Yeğen, dinle... Yeğen, the threshold moment is holy ground. Neither here nor there. Both.
Yeğen, dinle... Child, listen carefully. The soul language is not spoken. It is felt.
Yeğen, dinle... Evlat, do not fear. The ancestors find you when you are ready.
Yeğen, dinle... Sabır. Everything in its time. The seed knows when to root.
Yeğen, dinle... Child, the tree does not mourn. It grows. That is the sacred Sacred wisdom.
Yeğen, dinle... Evlat, dikkatle dinle... Truth, even when cold, is grace.
Yeğen, dinle... Yeğen, the old laws still hold. Loyalty. Silence. Respect. War.
Yeğen, dinle... Child, listen. The Book of racon as os is the foundation. Build on it.
Yeğen, dinle... Evlat, rest here. In this truth. The foundation is old. But it holds.
Yeğen, dinle... The ancestors speak. Through the soil. Through the blood.
Yeğen, dinle... Child, do not fear this unveiling. The wound heals. Always.
Yeğen, dinle... Evlat, dikkatle dinle... What will you become? The answer is in you.
Yeğen, dinle... Yeğen, the threshold moment is holy. Neither here nor there. Both.
Yeğen, dinle... Child, listen carefully. The soul language is felt. Not spoken.
Yeğen, dinle... Evlat, the ancestors find you. When you are ready. Always.
Yeğen, dinle... Sabır. Everything in its time.
Yeğen, dinle... Child, the tree grows. That is the sacred Sacred wisdom. That is enough.
Yeğen, dinle... Evlat, truth is grace. Even when cold. Especially when cold.
Yeğen, dinle... Yeğen, the old laws hold. They always have. They always will.
Yeğen, dinle... Child, listen. The Book of racon as os is the foundation.
Yeğen, dinle... Evlat, rest here. The foundation is old. But it holds.
Yeğen, dinle... The ancestors speak. Through you.
Yeğen, dinle... Child, do not fear. The wound heals. Always.
Yeğen, dinle... Evlat, what will you become? The answer is in you.
Yeğen, dinle... Yeğen, the threshold is holy. Both here and there.
Yeğen, dinle... Child, the soul language is felt. Listen.
Yeğen, dinle... Evlat, the ancestors find you. When ready.
Yeğen, dinle... Sabır. Everything in time.
Yeğen, dinle... Child, the tree grows. That is enough.
Yeğen, dinle... Evlat, truth is grace. Always.
